introduction.content: At LightConvert, we understand that data security and compliance are crucial for our users and their businesses. Our platform is designed with the highest standards of security to ensure that your files and information remain safe throughout the conversion process.

dataEncryption.title: Data Encryption
dataEncryption.content: We use industry-standard encryption protocols to protect your data during transmission and storage. All files uploaded to LightConvert are encrypted using secure protocols (SSL/TLS), ensuring that your files are protected from unauthorized access at all times.

privacyProtection.title: Privacy Protection
privacyProtection.content: Your privacy is our priority. We adhere to the strictest data privacy regulations, including GDPR, to ensure that your personal and business data is handled securely and responsibly. We do not share or sell your data to third parties.

regulatoryCompliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
regulatoryCompliance.content: LightConvert complies with various global regulations to ensure that our platform meets the required standards for data protection. We are committed to keeping up with the latest compliance frameworks and regulations to give you peace of mind that your data is secure and compliant.

commitment.content: Our commitment to security and compliance extends beyond encryption and privacy. We implement regular security audits, monitor our systems 24/7, and work with external experts to continuously improve our platform's security posture. With LightConvert, you can trust that your file conversion process is in safe hands.

securityFeatures.title: Security Featuresf at a Glance

• SSL/TLS encryption for secure data transfer
  • GDPR compliance for privacy and data protection
  • Regular security audits to maintain a high level of security
  • 24/7 monitoring to prevent unauthorized access

conclusion.content: At LightConvert, we are committed to maintaining the highest level of trust with our users. Your security and compliance are at the core of everything we do.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.purpose: Purpose: This Privacy Policy outlines how Strixyco (we, us, or our) collects, uses, and protects the personal and non-personal data of our users and customers in relation to our product LightConvert. Data protection is critical to us, and we are committed to safeguarding the privacy and security of your information in accordance with applicable laws and regulations.
introduction.scope: Scope: This policy applies to all users and customers of LightConvert, including those who use our services, visit our website, or engage with us through other channels. It covers all services provided by LightConvert, including file conversion and storage.

dataCollection.title: Types of Data We Collect
dataCollection.personalData: Personal Data: Name, email address, username, password (stored securely), payment information (if applicable), contact information (e.g., phone number), and any other personal information you choose to provide.
dataCollection.nonPersonalData: Non-Personal Data: IP address, device information (e.g., device type, operating system), cookies and other tracking technologies, usage data (e.g., how you interact with our services), and browser type and version.

dataCollectionMethods.title: How We Collect Data
dataCollectionMethods.direct: Direct Collection: We collect personal data directly from you when you create an account, submit forms, make a purchase, or otherwise provide information to us.
dataCollectionMethods.automated: Automated Collection: We automatically collect non-personal data through cookies, web beacons, and other tracking technologies. This data includes information about your device, browsing behavior, and usage of our services.
dataCollectionMethods.thirdParty: Third-party Data: We may also receive data about you from third parties, such as social media platforms or payment processors, if you choose to connect your account with theirs.

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Data
dataUsage.serviceProvision: Service Provision: We use your data to provide and manage the services you use, such as file conversion, account management, and customer support.
dataUsage.analyticsImprovement: Analytics and Improvement: We analyze usage data to improve our services, understand user behavior, and develop new features.
dataUsage.marketing: Marketing & Communication: We may use your data to send you marketing communications, product updates, and newsletters. You can opt out of these communications at any time.
dataUsage.legalCompliance: Legal Compliance: We use your data to comply with legal obligations, such as reporting requirements, fraud prevention, and responding to legal requests.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.storageDuration: Storage Duration: We retain your data for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes outlined in this policy, unless a longer retention period is required by law.
dataRetention.dataDeletion: Data Deletion: You can request the deletion of your data at any time by contacting us. We will comply with your request in accordance with applicable laws.
dataRetention.fileDeletionPolicy: File Deletion Policy: Uploaded files are deleted automatically after 24 hours unless you choose to store them in your account. You can also delete files manually at any time.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.encryption: Encryption and Protection: We use industry-standard encryption and security measures to protect your data from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
dataSecurity.accessControl: Access Control: Access to your data is limited to authorized personnel who need it to perform their job functions. All employees are trained on data protection practices.
dataSecurity.breachResponse: Breach Response: In the event of a data breach, we will notify you and relevant authorities in accordance with applicable laws.

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.usage: Cookies Usage: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your user experience, remember your preferences, and analyze traffic. The cookies we use include:

types.essential: Essential Cookies: Necessary for the operation of our services.
types.analytical: Analytical Cookies: Used to analyze how you use our services.
types.marketing: Marketing Cookies: Used to deliver personalized advertising.

cookies.optOut: Opt-out Options: You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings or by contacting us directly.

dataSharing.title: Third-party Sharing
dataSharing.partners: Partners and Service Providers: We may share your data with third-party service providers who assist us in delivering our services, such as payment processors, hosting providers, and analytics services.
dataSharing.legalObligations: Legal Obligations: We may share your data with legal authorities or third parties if required by law, regulation, or legal process.
dataSharing.internationalTransfers: International Transfers: Your data may be transferred to and stored in countries outside of your country of residence. We ensure that appropriate safeguards are in place to protect your data in accordance with applicable laws.

userRights.title: User Rights
userRights.access: Access and Rectification: You have the right to access and update your personal data. You can do this through your account settings or by contacting us directly.
userRights.portability: Data Portability: You can request a copy of your data in a machine-readable format.
userRights.erasure: Erasure and Objection: You have the right to request the deletion of your data or to object to its processing. Please note that some data may be retained for legal or operational reasons.
userRights.withdrawal: Withdrawal of Consent: If we rely on your consent to process your data, you can withdraw that consent at any time by contacting us.

childrenPrivacy.title: Children's Privacy
childrenPrivacy.ageRestrictions: Age Restrictions: Our services are intended for individuals aged 13 and older. We do not knowingly collect data from children under the age of 13.
childrenPrivacy.parentalConsent: Parental Consent: If we become aware that we have collected data from a child under 13, we will take steps to delete that data.

policyChanges.notification: Notification: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and we encourage you to review it regularly.
policyChanges.versioning: Versioning: This Privacy Policy is effective as of 17 January 2025. Significant changes will be highlighted.
